data.name: Sample - Micro Focus Service Manager - 1.3.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Micro Focus Service Manager" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Change: Get Change List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of change requests from the Service Manager server, based on the query and other input parameters you have specified

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Get Change List

workflows.name: Device: Get Device List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of devices from the Micro Focus Service Manager server, based on the query and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Get Device List

workflows.name: Change: Create Change
workflows.description: Creates a new change request on the Service Manager server, based on the input parameters you have specified

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Create Change

workflows.name: Incident: Get Incident
workflows.description: Retrieves details about a specific incident from the Micro Focus Service Manager server, based on the incident ID you have specified.

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Get Incident

workflows.name: Change: Get Change Request
workflows.description: Retrieves details about a specific change request from the Service Manager server, based on the Change Request ID you have specified

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Get Change Request

workflows.name: Incident: Create Incident
workflows.description: Creates a new incident on the Micro Focus Service Manager server, based on the input parameters you have specified

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Create Incident

workflows.name: Device: Get Device
workflows.description: Retrieves details about a specific device from the Micro Focus Service Manager server, based on the configuration item you have specified.

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Get Device

routes.name: Read File -> Update RF for attachment

workflows.name: Incident: Get Incident List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of incidents from the Micro Focus Service Manager server, based on the query and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Get Incident List

workflows.name: Incident: Update Incident
workflows.description: Updates an existing incident on the Micro Focus Service Manager server, based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Micro Focus Service Manager: Update Incident
